page.title: 12UPDATE
page.content:
I am still a member of the guide movement lots of years on from writing this article whilst at RM Grylls School.

We still have lots of fun but the village fair no longs exists at Hartshead but we now in Liversedge and the guide movement are more modern and we go to Gigs and adventurous camps, jamborees and enjoy being a 100 year old single sex organsisation with basic values of sharing a common goal and having tons of fun :-)

PS

Bev the may queen now works at my daughters school, guides have a strange habit of turning up in all kinds of strange places :-)

Contribution by: Deborah White
